wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Hugh Dodsworth  (7 June 1928 – 29 March 2018) was a merchant banker and British Conservative Party politician.

response: Colman was the Labour candidate for South West Hertfordshire in the 1979 general election, but lost to the incumbent Conservative MP, Geoffrey Dodsworth.
